entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Snow beginning after midnight. Local snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023
